The claim was made by popular Nigerian s: also known as Pamilerin, in a tweet that featured a video showing vehicles driving through a white substance.
The claim gained significant attention o: with nearly a thousand likes on Twitter and over 22,000 views on Instagram.
The videos were shared on multiple platf: including Facebook and Instagram, with captions describing the substance as snow.
However: experts determined that the videos actually showed firefighting foam sprayed on the highway by the Lagos state fire service to prevent a fire outbreak after an accident involving an articulated truck carrying oil. This information was confirmed by the Lagos state information commissioner and the Director-General of Lagos State Emergency Management Agency.
